  • Methodendetails

    • drawTileMap

      public void drawTileMap()
      This method draws the tile map on the screen. It creates a new Pane to hold the tiles, initializes a MapDataReader to read the mapdata, and then loops through each row and column to create and position ImageViews for each tile in the map. Depending on the tile type, it sets the image for each tile. It also handles cases where the tile type is negative (representing items), storing the corresponding ImageViews in a map for later use.

    • getTileMapLengthInPixel

      public double getTileMapLengthInPixel()
      Returns the Tilemaps length
      Gibt zurück:
      the tilemaps Length as int in pictures
